definition: Describing an implantation procedure of a micro drive and flexDrive.

description.value: Implantation of microdrives or flexDrives in the Visual Cortex.

alternatives.V1ML: Primary visual cortex, monocular area, left hemisphere
alternatives.V1MR: Primary visual cortex, monocular area, right hemisphere
alternatives.V1BL: Primary visual cortex, binocular area, left hemisphere
alternatives.V1BR: Primary visual cortex, binocular area, right hemisphere
alternatives.V2LL: Secondary visual cortex, lateral area, left hemisphere
alternatives.V2LR: Secondary visual cortex, lateral area, right hemisphere
alternatives.V2ML: Secondary visual cortex, medial area, left hemisphere
alternatives.V2MR: Secondary visual cortex, medial area, right hemisphere

location.definition: Describes the brain area of implantation

position_reference.definition: By default position are specified by the coordinates of skull. Use this property for other definitions.

ref_electrode_location.definition: Describes the location of the reference electrode.
